Name: Modern UI 1.0.5
Description:
The ModernUI assembly including a demo app demonstrating the various features of Modern UI for WPF.

*BREAKING CHANGE*
This version is backwards incompatible. ModernDialog.ShowMessage returns MessageBoxResult instead of bool?

!! Related downloads

*NuGet*
ModernUI for WPF is also available as NuGet package in the NuGet gallery, id: *ModernUI.WPF*
*[url:Download|http://nuget.org/packages/ModernUI.WPF/]*

*Modern UI for WPF Templates*
A Visual Studio 2012 extension containing a collection of project and item templates for Modern UI for WPF. The extension includes the ModernUI.WPF NuGet package.
*[url:Download|http://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/7a4362a7-fe5d-4f9d-bc7b-0c0dc272fe31]*

Name: Modern UI 1.0.3
Description:
The ModernUI assembly including a sample app demonstrating the various features of Modern UI for WPF.

!! BREAKING CHANGES
In order to support custom themes, a number of APIs are backwards incompatible. The following changes have been applied:
* AppearanceManager.Current replaces static AppearanceManager
* enum Theme removed
* AppearanceManager.SwitchTheme no longer exists
